definitions.title: f.
definitions.body: :Ez Eze 40:16 window, abs. [[הַחַלּוֹן]] Ge 26:8 + 12 t.; cstr. [[חַלּוֹן]] Ge 8:6, Pr 7:6; sf. [[חַלּוֹנׇו֠]] Ez Eze 40:22; mpl. [[חַלּוֹנִים]] Ez Eze 40:25 + 3 t.; cstr. [[חַלּוֹנֵי]] 1Ki 6:4; sf. [[חַלּוֹנׇי֑]] Je 22:14 (defective pl. Ges:§ 87 (1) c, dual Ew:§ 177 a, but rd. [[יו סָפוֹן]]—[[ָ]] Mich Hi Gf Or Gie); [[חַלּוֹנֵינוּ]] Je 9:20; f. [[חַלּוֹנוֹת]] Ez Eze 40:16 + 4 t.; [[חַלּֽנוֹת]] Ct So 2:9 + 3 t.; window ´[[פָּתַח ח]] open the window Ge 8:6 (P) 2Ki 13:17; ´[[עלה בח]] Je 9:20; ´[[בעד הח]] through the window Ge 26:8, Jos 2:15 (J) Ju Jdg 5:28, 1Sa 19:12, 2Sa 6:16 = 1Ch 15:29, 2Ki 9:30, Joe 2:9; latticed windows 1Ki 6:4, Ez Eze 40:16, Eze 41:16, Eze 41:26; ´[[בּח]] Jos 2:18, Jos 2:21 (J) Pr 7:6, Zep 2:14; ´[[אֶל־הח]] 2Ki 9:32; ´[[מִן־הח]] Ct So 2:9; windows of palace, ([[ו]])[[קָרַע לוֹ חַלּוֹנׇי]] Je 22:14 cutteth him out his windows; of the gates of Ezek.'s temple Ez Eze 40:16, Eze 40:22, Eze 40:25, Eze 40:25, Eze 40:29, Eze 40:33, Eze 40:36, of the temple itself Ez Eze 41:16, Eze 41:16.
